TopicTitle: The Name Change Thread (WARNING! ONE TIME ONLY!)

Articles.Content:
I request a name change please. See contact ticket I have sent in please.

Thanks for the hard work.

MH

Permission granted, [@Wrench Head](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/175503-wrench-head/) ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif ":)") Sorry that yours was a bit complicated, but glad it worked out. Looking forward to seeing how your modding projects come along.

Please can my new name be 'Gameslinx'?

Thank you!

> 
> 
> 2 hours ago, Gamel0rd1 said:
> 
> 
> Please can my new name be 'Gameslinx'?
> 
> 
> 
> 
> Thank you!
> 

Name changed.
Could I have my name changed to Quarkz? (don't put the question mark in the name)

> 
> 
> 23 minutes ago, PhysicsBrain said:
> 
> 
> Could I have my name changed to Quarkz? (don't put the question mark in the name)
> 

Done. You may have to log in again but your password should be unchanged.

Question: I saw on the first page of the topic that "Kerman" isn't allowed in names. Does that mean I have to get mine changed?

**Edited <time datetime="2017-04-08T16:28:07Z" title="04/08/2017 04:28  PM" data-short="7 yr">April 8, 2017</time> by Benjamin Kerman**
  
Browser quit

Thank you for asking, [@Benjamin Kerman](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/172792-benjamin-kerman/), but our current software makes it easier to distinguish actual Squad people from members with Kerman names, so we don't need to enforce that rule as strictly anymore. Note: this decision is made on a case-by-case basis depending on the name's potential to confuse others.
So... I have another account (by accident) under the name Idefix. Can it be merged with this one? I still want to keep the name I am posting with.
I would like it changed to DeltaDizzy with capitals as shown.

> 
> 
> 14 minutes ago, GRLevel15 said:
> 
> 
> I would like it changed to DeltaDizzy with capitals as shown.
> 

Name changed.

> 
> 
> 23 minutes ago, Supernovy said:
> 
> 
> Name changed.
> 

Thanks!

> 
> 
> 59 minutes ago, qzgy said:
> 
> 
> So... I have another account (by accident) under the name Idefix. Can it be merged with this one? I still want to keep the name I am posting with.
> 

Merged. It may take some time for all the posts to change over.

And try not to accidentally create any more accounts.

> 
> 
> Just now, Supernovy said:
> 
> 
> Merged. It may take some time for all the posts to change over.
> 
> 
> 
> 
> And try not to accidentally create any more accounts.
> 

Thanks

Consider it done. 

Because it is.

I'd like to have my name capitalized please.

Gargamel

Especially since it doesn't count towards the name change, but I'll probably never change from this one any ways  :P.

Thanks!

Oh, and it needs to be a rule, mods need to quote the user before replying so their original name is saved for posterity :).

It doesn't bother me either way, I'm not planning on changing to another name, and I would like it capitalized please.  So go ahead.
